title: Roasted summer veg with herbs
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon thyme leaves', '1 teaspoon marjoram leaves', '1 teaspoon freshly chopped chives', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 courgettes, sliced into 1cm thick rounds', '3 potatoes, sliced into wedges', '3 tomatoes, sliced into wedges', '150g carrots, sliced into 1cm thick rounds', '2 red or green peppers, sliced into strips', '1 onion, sliced into thin wedges']
